greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = lcm(b(b(n)), b(n-b(n)+1)) where b(n) = A004001(n).
comment: See the order of certain subsequences in scatterplot link.
link: Altug Alkan, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Altug Alkan, Alternative Scatterplot of A283677
Index entries for sequences related to lcm's
program: (PARI) a=vector(1000); a[1]=a[2]=1; for(n=3, #a, a[n]=a[a[n-1]]+a[n-a[n-1]]); va = vector(1000, n, lcm(a[a[n]], a[n+1-a[n]]))
(Scheme) (define (A283677 n) (lcm (A004001 (A004001 n)) (A004001 (+ 1 (- n (A004001 n)))))) ;; (Code for A004001 given under that entry). - _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 18 2017
results.author: _Altug Alkan_, Mar 14 2017
